value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh my! This place is incredible!$k$pThe scenery is different in every
single direction...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Is each a window into another
world? Amazing...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|You might think of this world itself
as a gateway—one that links to every
world, where they all intersect.$k$pThis is my world.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Wow... So many... I'm speechless!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|It is of course understandable for
a mortal to be overwhelmed at such
a sight.$k$pNormally, mortals spend all of their
lives bound within a single world...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Alfonse, do you see that tree?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|That? Th-that's...a tree?$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|It is. Although, it is so large that it
may be difficult for you to see the
treeness of it, I suppose...$k$pThat is Yggdrasill, the World-Tree.$k$pThis is the tree that connects all
of the nine realms together.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yggdrasill...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Yggdrasill is where I came into being,
and it is the crossroads of the many
worlds and their dominions.$k$pWe must head for its base. The key
to the power of Yggdrasill may be
exactly what you need.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Lord Askr... We are
truly grateful.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Lord Askr... I don't mean to interrupt,
but I feel the need to ask... Are you
feeling all right?$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Hm? How do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Embla said...her darkness would
weaken you somehow...$k$pBut in order to help us, you—$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Aha! I understand you now, yes...
Well, as you can see, we need not
worry about that.$k$pShall we be off, then? Follow me!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I'm glad Lord Askr seems to have
been unaffected by the darkness!
Don't you agree, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Indeed.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Enemy ahead! Use caution.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It seems Embla has followed us and
brought other uninvited guests along
with her...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|Lord Askr, there is a question
I must ask you.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|About Embla and her motivations,
I suspect? It is only natural.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|Yes.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|I will tell you... I only hope that you
are able to accept what I have to say.$k$pEmbla was not always as she
is now.$k$pLike me, she once loved— She
has always thought of the people
of the Emblian Empire.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|Long ago, Embla and I both granted
our power to mortals so that they
might use those powers to flourish.$k$pWe selected different peoples.
I chose those born in what is now
called Askr.$k$pShe, of course, chose those born
in what is now Embla...$k$pAnd for a time, the two peoples
lived separately from each other,
and they were content.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|Then...why?$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|It all started with a simple
misunderstanding. Some of the
Emblian people came to Askr.$k$pThey were attracted by the way
open exchange was valued there.$k$pThis, however...enraged Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|She believed those people chose
to desert her in favor Askr, and she
could not forgive that.$k$pHer people, of course, had no such
feelings... But she refused to believe
anything they said.$k$pEmbla forbade her people to leave
to other worlds. Anyone who did
not obey was punished, severely.$k$pThe people grew to fear Embla,
and the number that fled from
her only grew...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Anger|...Naturally.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I know she was deeply hurt, and
that hurt only grew deeper...$k$pEveryone left her, and she was
completely alone... I cannot begin
to imagine her pain.$k$pI offered to help her, but she
met me with hatred and refused.
There was nothing I could do.$k$p$EFace_Normal2|In the end, Embla used her power
to completely close off her world.$k$pThat way, those people who were
still with her would no longer have
even the possibility of leaving.$k$pThen she took control of their very
hearts and turned them to her will
so there was no chance of betrayal...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|That is the Embla I know...$k$pShe cared so very deeply about
mortals once.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Anger|And yet...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Anger|She crossed a line that should
not ever be crossed.$k$pWe have no choice but to fight her.
As much as it pains me, we can
never return to how it was before...$k$p$EFace_Normal2|Though, I admit that I cannot
help hoping it does, somehow.$k$pThat wish, to return to the days
when Embla and her people lived
together happily, drives me.$k$p$Sbs150|
